abstract.t: TRILL supports multi-access LAN links that can have multiple RBridges attached. This draft specifies RBridge Aggregation which enables concurrent data forwarding for the hosts in the same VLAN on a LAN link via multiple RBridges without partition this LAN link. RBridge Aggregation offers active/active multi-homing to multi-access LAN links, which improves their reliability and increases the access bandwidth of RBridge campus.
